about_the_game:
20 custom voices will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode".
*The lines used by these voices are the same as those used by other custom voices.

Cast
Custom Male Voices
Pure 3: Kousuke Oonishi
Hot-blooded 3: Masato Kokubun
Optimist 3: Ikuto Kanemasa
Refined 3: Yoshimitsu Takasugi
Calm 3: Kousuke Oonishi
Hero 3: Ikuto Kanemasa
Leader 3: Masato Kokubun
Samurai 3: Yoshimitsu Takasugi
Veteran 3: Daiki Hamano
Silent 3: Ryo Iwasaki

Custom Female Voices
Innocent 3: Kasumi Hitosugi
Young 3: Mayu Isshiki
Graceful 3: Yuna Taniguchi
Active 3: Sanae Nakata
Determined 3: Yukari Ishii
Calm 3: Yoko Fujita
Old-fashioned 3: Mayu Isshiki
Alluring 3: Chieko Kagose
Brave 3: Yukari Ishii
Overbearing 3: Mari Hagai

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

*The lines used by these voices are the same as those used by other custom voices.

name: DW8E: Edit Voice Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
